title: Mustache Variables Registry Schema
description: Schema for validating the mustache variables registry generated by scan-mustache-variables.js

filesWithVariables.description: Number of files containing mustache variables

uniqueVariables.description: Number of unique mustache variables found

totalOccurrences.description: Total occurrences of all mustache variables across all files

mustacheVariable.description: Information about a single mustache variable
